      • validatePort

        public static int validatePort(int port)
        Validates integer value for port is within the value range [0, 255]. Throws exception if input value is outside the range.
        返回:
        port .

      • validateOccupantZoneId

        public static int validateOccupantZoneId(int zoneId)
        Validates zoneId is a valid occupant zone id.
        返回:
        zoneId.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if zoneId is not a valid occupant zone id.

      • validateDisplayType

        public static int validateDisplayType(int displayType)
        Validates displayType is a valid display type.
        返回:
        displayType.

      • setPhysicalPort

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setPhysicalPort(int port)
        Sets the display this configuration will apply to.

        The display can be identified by the physical port.

        参数:
        port - Port that is connected to a display. See android.view.DisplayAddress.Physical#getPort().

      • setOccupantZoneId

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setOccupantZoneId(int occupantZoneId)
        Sets the occupant zone of the display this configuration will apply to.

        The display can be identified by the combination of occupant zone id and display type.

        参数:
        occupantZoneId - Id of the occupant zone this display is configured in.

      • setDisplayType

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setDisplayType(int displayType)
        Sets the display type of the display this configuration will apply to.

        The display can be identified by the combination of occupant zone id and display type.

        参数:
        displayType - display type of the display in the occupant zone.

      • setUxRestrictions

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setUxRestrictions(int drivingState,
                                                                boolean requiresOptimization,
                                                                int restrictions)
        Sets ux restrictions for driving state.

      • setUxRestrictions

        @Deprecated
public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setUxRestrictions(int drivingState,
                                                                             CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.SpeedRange speedRange,
                                                                             boolean requiresOptimization,
                                                                             int restrictions)
        已过时。 Use #setUxRestrictions(int, DrivingStateRestrictions) instead.
        Sets UX restrictions with speed range.
        参数:
        drivingState - Restrictions will be set for this Driving state. See constants in CarDrivingStateEvent.
        speedRange - If set, restrictions will only apply when current speed is within the range. Only CarDrivingStateEvent.DRIVING_STATE_MOVING supports speed range. null implies the full speed range, i.e. zero to CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.SpeedRange.MAX_SPEED.
        requiresOptimization - Whether distraction optimization (DO) is required for this driving state.
        restrictions - See constants in CarUxRestrictions.

      • setUxRestrictions

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setUxRestrictions(int drivingState,
                                                                CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions drivingStateRestrictions)
        Sets UX restriction.
        参数:
        drivingState - Restrictions will be set for this Driving state. See constants in CarDrivingStateEvent.
        drivingStateRestrictions - Restrictions to set.
        返回:
        This builder object for method chaining.

      • setMaxStringLength

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder setMaxStringLength(int maxStringLength)

        public CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration build()
        返回:
